properties.$comment: Require fields here for Item Properties.

iceye:scene_id.title: Scene ID
iceye:scene_id.description: Scene center coordinates encoded in a [GeoHash](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geohash).

iceye:run_name.title: Run name
iceye:run_name.description: Processing instance name which produced this dataset.

iceye:frame_number.title: Frame number
iceye:frame_number.description: Given to each of a Stripmap for example.

iceye:resolution_range_near.title: Resolution in the near range
iceye:resolution_range_near.description:
Unit: **meters**
The resolution in the range direction depends on the incidence angle, it is calculated as follow `c / (2 * BW) / sin(incidence)`

iceye:resolution_range_far.title: Resolution in the far range
iceye:resolution_range_far.description:
Unit: **meters**
**How do we get this number**
The resolution in the range direction depends on the incidence angle, it is calculated as follow `c / (2 * BW) / sin(incidence)`

iceye:looks_range_bandwidth.title: Looks Range bandwidth
iceye:looks_range_bandwidth.description:
Unit: **Hz**
Bandwith utilized for each looks during mutlilooking.

iceye:looks_range_overlap.title: Looks range bandwidth overlap
iceye:looks_range_overlap.description: Percentage of bandwidth overlapping between looks.

iceye:looks_azimuth_bandwidth.title: Looks azimuth bandwidth
iceye:looks_azimuth_bandwidth.description:
Unit: **Hz**
Bandwith utilized for each looks during mutlilooking.

iceye:looks_azimuth_overlap.title: Looks azimuth bandwidth overlap
iceye:looks_azimuth_overlap.description: Percentage of bandwidth overlapping between looks.

iceye:synthetic_aperture_angle.title: Synthetic aperture angle
iceye:synthetic_aperture_angle.description:
Unit: **degrees**
Angular extent over which the radar collect signals from a target.

iceye:pulse_bandwidth.title: Pulse bandwidth
iceye:pulse_bandwidth.description:
Unit: **Hz**
Range of frequencies contained in each pulse.

iceye:acquisition_prf.title: Acquistion PRF
iceye:acquisition_prf.description:
Unit: **Hz**
Pulse Repetition Frequency (PRF) of the collection.

iceye:acquisition_range_sampling_rate.title: Range sampling rate
iceye:acquisition_range_sampling_rate.description:
Unit: **Samples/s**
Sampling rate used for digital sampling., defines range sample spacing.

iceye:zero_doppler_start_datetime.title: Zero doppler start date-time
iceye:zero_doppler_start_datetime.description:
Unit: **UTC**
Datetime at which the radial veloxity between the satellite and the position on the ground reach by the first pulse is zero.

iceye:zero_doppler_end_datetime.title: Zero doppler end date-time for polynomial (UTC)
iceye:zero_doppler_end_datetime.description:
Unit: **UTC**
Datetime at which the radial veloxity between the satellite and the position on the ground reach by the last pulse is zero.

iceye:doppler_centroid_coeffs.title: Doppler centroid polynomial coefficients
iceye:doppler_centroid_coeffs.description: 2d array MxN where M is the number of estimates and N number of coefficients.

iceye:doppler_centroid_datetimes.title: Doppler centroids datetimes
iceye:doppler_centroid_datetimes.description:
Unit: **UTC**
Timestamp for each doppler centroid estimate.

iceye:doppler_rate_coeffs.title: Doppler rate polynomial coefficients
iceye:doppler_rate_coeffs.description: Coefficients of doppler rate polynomial as a function of range time. Stored as a vector with size corresponding to the order of the doppler rate polynomial

iceye:orientation.title: Orientation
iceye:orientation.description: Orientation of the data. By default we use `shadows-down` where the satellite is "over" the image.

iceye:coordinate_frame.title: Coordinate frame
iceye:coordinate_frame.description: Coordinate frame used for the orbit positions and velocities.

iceye:orbit_mean_altitude.title: Orbit mean altitude
iceye:orbit_mean_altitude.description:
Unit: **meters**
Average orbit altitude over the acquisition period.

iceye:orbit_states.title: Orbit States (Object)
iceye:orbit_states.description: State vector array of the satellite over acquisition period.

iceye:orbit_precision.title: Orbit processing
iceye:orbit_precision.description: Orbit prediction level at with which this dataset was produced.

iceye:incidence_angle_near.title: Incidence angle near
iceye:incidence_angle_near.description:
Unit: **degrees**
Incidence angle at the near range.

iceye:incidence_angle_far.title: Incidence angle far
iceye:incidence_angle_far.description:
Unit: **degrees**
Incidence angle at the far range.

iceye:incidence_angle_coeffs.title: Incidence angle coeffs
iceye:incidence_angle_coeffs.description: Coefficients of the polynomial for calculating the incidence angle dependence in range

iceye:grazing_angle_near.title: Grazing angle near
iceye:grazing_angle_near.description:
Unit: **degrees**
Grazing angle at the far range.

iceye:grazing_angle.title: Grazing angle
iceye:grazing_angle.description:
Unit: **degrees**
Grazing angle at the center range.

iceye:grazing_angle_far.title: Grazing angle far
iceye:grazing_angle_far.description:
Unit: **degrees**
Grazing angle at the far range.

iceye:squint_angle.title: Squint angle
iceye:squint_angle.description:
Unit: **degrees**
Squint angle at the center range.

iceye:layover_angle.title: Layover angle
iceye:layover_angle.description:
Unit: **degrees**
Layover angle at the center range.

iceye:shadow_angle.title: Shadow angle
iceye:shadow_angle.description:
Unit: **degrees**
Shadow angle at the center range.

iceye:doppler_cone_angle.title: Doppler cone angle
iceye:doppler_cone_angle.description:
Unit: **degrees**
Doppler cone angle is the angle between the velocity vector of the satellite and the line of sight to the scene center where relative velocity is zero.

iceye:average_scene_height.title: Average scene height
iceye:average_scene_height.description:
Unit: **meters**
Average height of the scene from terrain model.

err_bias.title: Bias error
err_bias.description: The RMS bias error in meters per horizontal axis of all points in the image (-1.0 if unknown)

err_rand.title: Random error
err_rand.description: RMS random error in meters per horizontal axis of each point in the image (-1.0 if unknown)

line_num_coeff.title: Line Numerator Coefficients
line_num_coeff.description: Twenty coefficients for the polynomial in the Numerator of the rn equation.

line_den_coeff.title: Line Denominator Coefficients
line_den_coeff.description: Twenty coefficients for the polynomial in the Denominator of the rn equation.

samp_num_coeff.title: Sample Numerator Coefficients
samp_num_coeff.description: Twenty coefficients for the polynomial in the Numerator of the cn equation.

samp_den_coeff.title: Sample Denominator Coefficients
samp_den_coeff.description: Twenty coefficients for the polynomial in the Denominator of the cn equation.

iceye:ground_to_slant_coeff.title: Ground to Slant range Coefficients.
iceye:ground_to_slant_coeff.description: Ground range to slant range polynomial coefficients

iceye:focal_plane_normal.title: Normal vector of focal plane
iceye:focal_plane_normal.description:
Unit: **meters**
Unit normal vector of the image focal plan.

iceye:image_plane_normal.title: Normal vector of image plane
iceye:image_plane_normal.description:
Unit: **meters**
Unit normal vector of the projected image plan.

iceye:extent_range.title: Extent range
iceye:extent_range.description:
Unit: **meters**
Scene extent in the range direction.

iceye:extent_azimuth.title: Extent Azimuth
iceye:extent_azimuth.description:
Unit: **meters**
Scene extent in the azimuth direction.

iceye:processing_start_datetime.title: Processing start datetime
iceye:processing_start_datetime.description:
Unit: **UTC**
Datetime at which the image formation started.

iceye:processing_end_datetime.title: Processing end datetime
iceye:processing_end_datetime.description:
Unit: **UTC**
Datetime at which this file was created.

iceye:processing_bandwidth_azimuth.title: Processing bandwidth azimuth
iceye:processing_bandwidth_azimuth.description:
Unit: **Hz**
Doppler bandwidth used for azimuth compression (defines achievable azimuth resolution)

iceye:window_function_azimuth.title: Window function azimuth
iceye:window_function_azimuth.description: Windowing function used over azimuth frequencies

iceye:window_function_range.title: Window function range
iceye:window_function_range.description: Windowing function used over range frequencies

iceye:processing_prf.title: Processing PRF
iceye:processing_prf.description:
Unit: **Hz**
Pulse Repetition Frequency used for the processing, defines azimuth sample spacing in time (can be higher than acquisition in cases where the Doppler frequency needs to be unfolded due to high variation of Doppler centroid with range)

iceye:calibration_factor.title: Calibration factor
iceye:calibration_factor.description: Scaling coefficients to be applied to calibrate amplitude product to absolute brigthness intensity.

^(?!iceye:).$comment: Do not allow any other prefix.
